statements: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE location_id = 5
SELECT transaction_amount, biometric_data FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 10
SELECT id, location_id FROM transactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, timestamp, location_id FROM transactions WHERE id = 100
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp, transaction_amount, location_id, biometric_data FROM transactions WHERE id = 5
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND location_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY transaction_count DESC
SELECT location_id, AVG(transaction_amount) as avg_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY location_id HAVING avg_amount > 1000
SELECT user_id, timestamp, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE biometric_data ->> 'fingerprints' = 'true' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 1234;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM biometric_data WHERE biometric_type = 'face';
SELECT user_id, fingerprint_id FROM biometric_data WHERE user_id = 5678;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM biometric_data WHERE biometric_type = 'fingerprint' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, fingerprint_id FROM biometric_data WHERE fingerprint_id LIKE '%abc%'
SELECT user_id, biometric_data, payment_amount, payment_time FROM User_Biometric_Payments;
SELECT payment_time, payment_amount, user_id, biometric_data FROM User_Biometric_Payments;
SELECT * FROM Transaction_Log WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_time FROM Transaction_Log WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT merchant_name, location, merchant_id FROM Merchant_Information;
SELECT * FROM User_Biometric_Payments ORDER BY payment_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, biometric_data FROM User_Biometric_Payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT MAX(payment_amount) AS max_payment FROM User_Biometric_Payments;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM Transaction_Log GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;

SELECT User_Biometric_Payments.user_id, User_Biometric_Payments.payment_amount, Merchant_Information.merchant_name FROM User_Biometric_Payments JOIN Transaction_Log ON User_Biometric_Payments.user_id = Transaction_Log.user_id JOIN Merchant_Information ON Transaction_Log.user_id = Merchant_Information.merchant_id WHERE payment_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT city, country FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, fingerprint FROM biometrics WHERE user_id = 200;
SELECT username, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE phone_number = '1234567890';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT location_id, city, country FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, fingerprint FROM biometrics WHERE faceprint IS NULL;
SELECT user_id, username, email, phone_number FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM biometric_payments;
SELECT user_id, payment_amount FROM biometric_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM user_data WHERE user_age > 30;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM biometric_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT method_id, payment_method FROM payment_methods ORDER BY method_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM biometric_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email FROM user_data WHERE user_age > 18;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM biometric_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT log_id, user_id, payment_date, transaction_type FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_type = 'Payment' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT trans_date, trans_amount FROM user_transactions WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY trans_date DESC LIMIT 5;
